snippet.title: EVERSPACE 2 | Console Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
The much-anticipated single-player space action RPG, EVERSPACE 2, debuts on PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S August 15, 2023. 

Experience an exciting sci-fi story set in a vivid, handcrafted open world full of secrets, puzzles, and perils. Take flight in nine different ship classes to set out and explore over 100 handcrafted areas scattered across multiple star systems. 

Pre-order now for 20% off on PlayStation: 
NA - https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP1562-PPSA15671_00-0882639737248983
EU / UK - https://store.playstation.com/de-de/product/EP1547-PPSA14033_00-0169394001813237

Coming soon to Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/everspace-2/9pfx7f33kvg8

Available now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1128920/EVERSPACE_2/

Follow us on: 
https://www.facebook.com/everspace.game 
https://twitter.com/everspace_game 
https://www.reddit.com/r/EverspaceGame/
http://discord.gg/rockfishgames

Music used in and officially licensed for the trailer: "Piece of Mind" by "Kings & Creatures", written by "Paul Bondy" 

Co-published by: Position Music; www.positionmusic.com Kings & Creatures, https://www.kingsandcreatures.com
